name: The Circle of Dance
description:
Use mouse to move the circle of dance and LEFT MOUSE CLICK or SPACEBAR to dance to the rhythm. The goal of the game is to collect as many dancers in your circle. You need to spin fast enough to collect dancers. You get speed by matching the rhythm.

NOTE: Please play on a Chromium based browser (Chrome, Opera etc) as the notes become out of sync in Firefox.

Write your score in the comments!
